Block.Text: {C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}And so {Name}{C1} won the great {Color:34}battle{Color:33} against the other {Color:34}Warlords{Color:33},{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Indeed, the legend of {Name}{C1} continues to inspire the people of {Color:34}Ransei{Color:33} to this very day.{End}
